cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
import astropy
print(f'Astropy version: {astropy.__version__}')
from astropy.io import fits
import tempfile
import os
# Test various VLA formats
formats_to_test = [
    ('QD', [[0], [0, 0]]),  # Original case
    ('QI', [[1], [1, 2]]),  # Integer VLA
    ('QE', [[1.0], [1.0, 2.0]]),  # Float VLA
]
for fmt, data in formats_to_test:
    print(f'\\nTesting format {fmt} with data {data}')
    try:
        col = fits.Column('test', format=fmt, array=data)
        hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])

        with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(suffix='.fits', delete=False) as f:
            temp_file = f.name

        hdu.writeto(temp_file, overwrite=True)
        diff = fits.FITSDiff(temp_file, temp_file)
        print(f'Format {fmt}: identical = {diff.identical}')

        if not diff.identical:
            print('BUG DETECTED!')
            fits.printdiff(temp_file, temp_file)

        os.unlink(temp_file)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f'Error with format {fmt}: {e}')
"
Astropy version: 7.1.0

Testing format QD with data [[0], [0, 0]]
Format QD: identical = True

Testing format QI with data [[1], [1, 2]]
Format QI: identical = True

Testing format QE with data [[1.0], [1.0, 2.0]]
Format QE: identical = True

cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
import astropy
print(f'Astropy version: {astropy.__version__}')

from astropy.io import fits
import tempfile
import os

# Test various VLA formats
formats_to_test = [
    ('QD', [[0], [0, 0]]),  # Original case
    ('QI', [[1], [1, 2]]),  # Integer VLA
    ('QE', [[1.0], [1.0, 2.0]]),  # Float VLA
]

for fmt, data in formats_to_test:
    print(f'\\nTesting format {fmt} with data {data}')
    try:
        col = fits.Column('test', format=fmt, array=data)
        hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])
        
        with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(suffix='.fits', delete=False) as f:
            temp_file = f.name
        
        hdu.writeto(temp_file, overwrite=True)
        diff = fits.FITSDiff(temp_file, temp_file)
        print(f'Format {fmt}: identical = {diff.identical}')
        
        if not diff.identical:
            print('BUG DETECTED!')
            fits.printdiff(temp_file, temp_file)
        
        os.unlink(temp_file)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f'Error with format {fmt}: {e}')
"
